ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OFFICIAL 9 -7 DOCUMENTS o ADMINISTRATION AGREEMENT FOR DEPOSIT TO BALANCE ACCOUNT PENDING THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A TRUST FUND Administration Agreement for deposit to balance account pending the signing of a Contribution Agreement for the Timor-Leste Strategic Partnership Multi-Donor Trust Fund (MTO No. 1089) AusAID Agreement No. 68049 Article 1 Subject and Amount of the Grant Section 1.01. In pursuance of the Cofinancing and Trust Funds Framework Agreement between the Government of Australia ("Donor") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ("IBRD") and the International Development Association ("IDA") (collectively the "Bank") dated 2 June 2004, as amended (the "Framework Agreement"), and pursuant to the letter from the Bank to the Australian Agency for International Development (AusAID) dated March 17, 2008 setting out the arrangements and terms for maintaining Donor Balance Accounts (TF029013 and TF029047) (the "Terms of Balance Accounts"), I am pleased to inform you of the intention of the Donor to make available a grant of one million five hundred thousand Australian Dollars (AUD1,500,000) (the "Contribution"), to be held by the Bank in the Balance Account TF029047 (the "Balance Account") pending the subsequent signing of a Contribution Agreement for the Timor-Leste Strategic Partnership Multi-Donor Trust Fund (the "Contribution Agreement"). Section 1.02. The Bank will hold the Contribution in the Balance Account pending the signature of the Contribution Agreement. Upon the signature of the Contribution Agreement, the Bank will transfer the Contribution from the Balance Account to the Timor-Leste Strategic Partnership Multi-Donor Trust Fund. Section 1.03. The terms of the Framework Agreement and the Terms of Balance Account shall apply to the Contribution. The Bank shall administer the Contribution in accordance with the provisions of the Framework Agreement and the Terms of Balance Accounts, except as otherwise provided herein. Article 2 Payment Schedule and Modalities Section 2.01. The Donor shall deposit the Contribution into the bank account specified in paragraph 2(b) of the Terms of Balance Account, promptly following countersignature of this Agreement by the Donor. Section 2.02 When making such deposit, the Donor shall instruct its bank to include in its payment details information (remittance advice) field of its SWIFT payment message information indicating: the amount paid, that the payment is made by the Donor for TF02947, for the purpose of the Timor-Leste Strategic Partnership Multi-Donor Trust Fund, and the date of the deposit. In addition, the Donor shall provide a copy of the Donor's deposit instruction to the
ï»¿-2- Bank's Accounting Trust Funds Division by e-mail sent to tfremiadvice@worldbank.org or by fax sent to (202) 614-1315. Article 3 Reallocation or Refund of the Contribution Section 3.01. If the Bank and the Donor have not concluded the Contribution Agreement within six (6) months following countersignature of this Agreement by the Donor, the Donor will instruct the Bank by written notice to either allocate the Contribution funds to another existing trust fund or refund the Contribution funds. The investment income will remain in the Donor's Balance Account and will not be subject to refund to the Donor. In the event that after six (6) months, the Donor instructs the Bank to refund the Contribution funds, a written notification will be sent by the Donor to the Bank containing the account information necessary for the remittance of the Contribution. Article 4 Communications Section 4.01. The offices responsible for coordination of all matters related to this Administration Agreement are: For the Donor: For the Bank: Jonathan Gouy Luis Constantino Director Country Manager Governance for Development, Timor Leste EACDF Australian Agency for International Development The World Bank GPO Box 887 Avenida dos Direitos Humanos Canberra ACT 2601 Dili Australia Timor-Leste Tel: +670 7732 6616 Tel: +670 332 2367 Fax: +670 332 3261 Fax: +670 332 1178 E-mail: Jonathan. Gouv@ausaid. Rov.au E-mail: Iconstantino@worldbank.org Article 5 Disclosure Section 5.01. The Bank will disclose this Agreement and related information on this Balance Account in accordance with the World Bank Policy on Access to Information. By entering into this Agreement, the Donor consents to disclosure of this Agreement and related information on this Balance Account. This Administration Agreement is drawn up in two originals, one for each party. It may be amended only by written agreement of the parties hereto.
ï»¿-3- GOVERNMENT OF AUSTRALIA By: Vincent Ashcroft Minister Counsellor, Timor-Leste Australian Agency for International Development (AusAID) Name: Title: Date: INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT / INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION Micha Koch, Director Global Partnerships and Trust Fund Operations Name: Title: Date: 2o__(:K
